content.rendered:
Another year, another achievement for Search Berg!

After successfully completing 10,000 projects in 2016, we have now reached another milestone of completing 15,000 SEO projects successfully. These figures are a testament to our immense client potential and how we have made them successful online and transformed their online website into a revenue generating portal.

As a full-scale digital marketing services provider based in New York, we bring on board 10 years of experience in this industry. We are an award winning agency; winning the 2017 SiteJabber Customer Choice awards. Our services include Search Engine Optimization and also expand into PPC marketing, social media management, reputation management and web design.
These is sound reasoning behind our success. There are no contracts at Search Berg. We offer a 30 day money back guarantee if our result-driven strategies fail to rank client websites in Google. All our strategies conform to Google guidelines and are designed to promote online presence and visibility of a website. We help create exceptional content that enables them to attract relevant traffic and generate organic leads

Search Berg has worked with thousands of clients spanning hundreds of industries. including politicians, real estate, travel, health and education, lifestyle, fashion to name a few. You can view our portfolio here.

If you’re considering going digital with your business, do so with confidence by hiring Search Berg for SEO. Call us at 8555-444-4777! To get a quote and receive a free SEO audit report, click here.
